heading: Today
text: Any patchy fog and high clouds giving way to sun. Some clouds far south.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Increasing clouds, a chance of showers far south late.

heading: Thursday
text: Rain becoming likely from the Green Mountains west. Early sun east, a rising chance of showers.

heading: Friday
text: Rain north, tapering to showers. Scattered showers south.
temperature: Low to mid 50s, steady or falling
